$values.Title: Update 4 released! + Q&A
$values.Description:
After almost a year of development, the update is out! You can find out about the changes in "What's new" menu.

Some questions I want to answer:
Q: Will the scythe get reworked?
A: Yes, it will in update 5. I heard your feedback about this weapon and will try myself to implement it in a better way.

Q: Will some removed features return to the mod?
A: Removed & delayed features will be added in next minor updates. There'll be versions 4.1, 4.2, 4.3 and beyond. I want to push every minor update every 1-2 months.

Q: What will update 5 add?
A: It's early to talk about it now, but I want it to add new content such as new weapons, mechanics and robots. It'll probably be released in the second half of 2025.

$values.Title: Update 4 test build released!
$values.Description:
Update 4 testing phase has begun!
This update focuses on technical improvements to the mod and doesn't contain many content additions.
- Weapon skins editor available to everyone
- Improved modded UI to support controllers and better fit the game style
- In-game mod update system
- Customizable title screen
- New graphics additions

$values.Title: Survey: Update 4 UI redesign
$values.Description:
In update 4 all modded user interfaces were reworked to better fit the game style.
If you were playing with the mod before update 4, you may want to give me a feedback!
$values.Survey: New UI is better@There's something to work on@Old UI was better
